languages.text: "Значит, нас бросили на растерзание ведьмам. Даже если мы переживем этот бой, возмездие Темного города нам пережить не удастся. Надеюсь, Аребенниан точно знает, чем закончится его пьеса".
"So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
languages.original_text: "Значит, нас бросили на растерзание ведьмам. Даже если мы переживем этот бой, возмездие Темного города нам пережить не удастся. Надеюсь, Аребенниан точно знает, чем закончится его пьеса".

traits.locale_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wytches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
"So we have been thrown to the Wytches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
"So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
"So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
"So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."
"So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

languages.text: « Nous avons donc été livrés aux Cérastes. Même si nous survivons à ce combat, nous n'échapperons pas au châtiment de la Cité Crépusculaire. J'espère que l'Arebennian a un plan très précis en tête. »
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons donc été livrés aux Cérastes. Même si nous survivons à ce combat, nous n'échapperons pas au châtiment de la Cité Crépusculaire. J'espère que l'arebennian a un plan très précis en tête. »

languages.text: “也就是说，我们被扔给了巫灵教派。就算我们能从那场角斗中活下来，也躲不过黑暗之城的惩罚。我希望那个独角知道他这场戏打算如何结束。”
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，我们被扔给了巫灵教派。就算我们能从那场角斗中活下来，也躲不过黑暗之城的惩罚。我希望那个独角知道他这场戏打算如何结束。”

languages.text: 「ウィッチどもの中に放り込まれたわけか。この戦いを切り抜けたとしても、仄暗き都からの報復から生き延びることはできないだろうな。アーベニアンには、自らの芝居がどんな結末を迎えるのか分かっていてほしいものだが」
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: 「ウィッチどもの中に放り込まれたわけか。この戦いを切り抜けたとしても、仄暗き都からの報復から生き延びることはできないだろうな。アーベニアンには、自らの芝居がどんな結末を迎えるのか分かっていてほしいものだが」

languages.text: "Man hat uns also den Hekatari vorgeworfen. Selbst wenn wir den Kampf überleben, werden wir die Vergeltung der Dunklen Stadt nicht überleben. Ich hoffe, Arebennian weiß genau, wie sein Spiel enden wird."
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: "Man hat uns also den Hekatari vorgeworfen. Selbst wenn wir den Kampf überleben, werden wir die Vergeltung der Dunklen Stadt nicht überleben. Ich hoffe, Arebennian weiß genau, wie sein Spiel enden wird."

languages.text: «Nos han arrojado a las brujas. Incluso aunque sobrevivamos a este combate, no tendremos tanta suerte contra la venganza de la Ciudad Siniestra. Espero que Arebennian sepa exactamente cómo ha de terminar su representación».
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: «Nos han arrojado a las brujas. Incluso aunque sobrevivamos a este combate, no tendremos tanta suerte contra la venganza de la Ciudad Siniestra. Espero que Arebennian sepa exactamente cómo ha de terminar su representación».

languages.text: "Bizi Viçlerin önüne attılar yani... Bu savaştan kurtulsak dahi Kara Şehir'in gazabından kurtulamayacağız. Arebennian, oyununun nasıl sonuçlanacağını biliyordur umarım."
languages.original_text: "So we have been thrown to the Wyches. Even if we survive this fight, we will not survive the retribution of the Dark City. I hope the Arebennian knows exactly how his play is going to end."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi Viçlerin önüne attılar yani... Bu savaştan kurtulsak dahi Kara Şehir'in gazabından kurtulamayacağız. Arebennian, oyununun nasıl sonuçlanacağını biliyordur umarım."
